description:
Extended canoe and kayak jaunts feature inevitable splashes and spray. The Surge Pant blends eXhaust 2.5 and eXhaust 3.0 fabrics for protection that’s both lightweight and comfortable. Articulated knees let you switch up your paddling position and the adjustable waist and ankle closures add a customizable, secure fit.

  • eXhaust blended nylon fabric is waterproof, breathable and lightweight
  • Reinforced in high wear areas for extra durability
  • 0.5mm neoprene adjustable waistband with adjustable single-cuff ankle closure
  • Articulated knees and legs accommodate a variety of paddling positions
  • Secure hidden key pocket with drainage
name: Level Six Surge Pants - Unisex
